content.html: Got an update on an 8 year old GitHub issue and I love it! Open source doesn't have to obey to the stressed out hyper-iteration of modern day startups / tech companies Open source can allow itself to opt for longevity Keep issues open. Nurture them. Curate them. #noToStaleBot
content.value:
Got an update on an 8 year old GitHub issue and I love it!

Open source doesn't have to obey to the stressed out hyper-iteration of modern day startups / tech companies

Open source can allow itself to opt for longevity

Keep issues open. Nurture them. Curate them. #noToStaleBot
